chap.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Programming ( 3 hrs )

chap.title: Chapter 2: PYTHON INTRODUCTION (1 hrs)
desc: How a Python Program runs on our system?

Continuous Probability Distributions - Gaussian, Normal, etc

chap.title: Chapter 2: Statistics Foundations (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central tendency and Dispersion
Sampling theory and scales of measurement

chap.title: Chapter 3: Hypothesis Testing and its Applications (1 hrs)
desc: Basic Concepts - Formulation of Hypothesis, Making a decision
Advanced Concepts - Choice of Test - t test vs z test
Evaluation of Test - P value and Critical Value approach

chap.title: Chapter 4: Exploratory Data Analysis and the Art of Storytelling (1 hrs)
Chapter 1:A primer on Machine Learning ( 3 hrs )
desc: Types of Learning - Supervised, Unsupervised and Reinforcement
Types of Analysis - Descriptive, Predictive, and Prescriptive
Bias Variance Tradeoff - Overfitting vs Underfitting

chap.title: Chapter 2: Regression
desc: What is linear in Linear Regression?
Model Evaluation Metrics for regression problems - MAE, RMSE, MSE, and MAP

chap.title: Chapter 3: Classification
desc: Up sampling, Down sampling and SMOTE

chap.title: Chapter 4: Clustering-K means
desc: K Means Algorithms - Partition based model for clustering

chap.title: Chapter 5: KNN

chap.title: Chapter 7: Decision Trees

desc: Introduction to Bagging as an Ensemble technique
Bootstrap Aggregation and Out of Bag error

How Bagging overcomes the overfitting problem?
How Boosting overcomes the Bias - Variance Tradeoff

chap.title: Chapter 11: Time-series Analysis
desc: The Random Walk model and Stationarity of Time Series
Tests for Stationarity - ADF and Dickey- Fuller test, AR, MA, ARIMA, SARIMA models
A regression approach to time series forecasting.

chap.title: Chapter 12: Machine Learning Pipeline & auto ML
desc: Serving the model via Rest API & Keras.

chap.title: Chapter 6: Restricted Boltzmann Machines and Autoencoders.
desc: Application of RBMs in Collaborative filtering

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Language modelling

Review.title: Why get enrolled in our Advanced Data Science course ?
Review.desc: Skillslash offers Best Data Science course with placement guarantee. Besides, our Data Science courses are designed for creative minds and also made for everyone. So, take our Artificial intelligence and Data science course and experience the new era of education!

Fee.desc: The Data Science course fees in Canada start from INR 65,000 (Excluding GST). Besides, we aim to deliver to you quality education considering the aspect of feasibility.
Fee.desc1: The Data Science course, We have at Skillslash is designed giving focus to affordability. So, we give you several financial options to manage and budget the expenses of your Data Science course fees. Because, we believe in fair reachability and access to all our carefully curated Data Science programs. Therefore, you get options such as EMI to pay the fees of our Data Science courses.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Go through the FAQs to know more about our Data Science course in Canada. Also, learn about our Data Science course fees, project certifications, other Data Science and AI course details.

FaqDATA.ques: What does Skillslash guarantee a job in the Data Science field?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash’s Data Science course is fully aligned to meet students’ success. Starting from the curriculum of the Data Science course, attention is given to ensure the meeting of industry standards. The Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Syllabus is extensive, giving particular emphasis to real-time project training. Besides, by enrolling in Skillslash’s Data Science course in Canada, students can earn real-work experience and direct project certifications from top Startups. This can undoubtedly boost their portfolios to get weightage in interviews.Under Skillslash’s flagship Guaranteed job referral program, special focus is given to resume/portfolio building assistance, career mentorship, and counseling. Moreover, to top it all, we set up interviews for our students. And also, give them mock interview trials and unlimited job referrals. So as to assure a sure placement in top Data Science firms.

FaqDATA.ques: Will there be a make-up class available if I have to miss a Data Science class due to an emergency?
FaqDATA.ans: Firstly, we offer live online classes for our
FaqDATA.ansAfter: Also, all of our students have access to the recorded versions of these data science classes. In addition, we also give you unlimited access to these Data Science training sessions. So, you can go back to them whenever you need theoretical help in Data science, in your AI and ML career. As a result, you need not be disappointed if you miss any of the live classes under our Data science courses. However, we strongly advise you to participate in all live classes.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the various learning options offered under Skillslash's Data Science Course?
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, we offer online learning choices for our Data Science with real-work experience. Aside from that, we provide a blended learning program designed specifically for working professionals. In addition, you can participate in live online Data science training sessions in hybrid learning mode. Besides, under our Data science training course in Canada, you will also be performing some hands-on work on the industrial project site.That said, we can only offer fully online data science classes via live sessions due to the outbreak. This means you can talk to your instructor in real time, just like in a traditional face-to-face session. Besides, now, all practical sessions of our Data Science and Artificial Intelligence courses in Canada will be conducted using cloud-based services.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of Certification does the Data Science training in Canada provide
FaqDATA.ans: Most importantly, by getting our Data science course training in Canada, you will not just obtain any ordinary type of certification or academic degree. Instead, we offer a globally recognized project management certificate. The firm with which you completed your industrial project can also give you direct certifications.

FaqDATA.ques: What is Skillslash's scholarship program under the Data Science course?
FaqDATA.ans: First of all, every candidate will be given the opportunity to take a 20-minute online exam. So that, their aptitude in Data science can by analyzed. If a candidate passes the aptitude exam with a score of more than 65 percent, he or she will be eligible for a 30 percent discount on the course fees. Besides, candidates who lost their jobs as a result of the COVID situation, as well as mothers who want to begin their careers, can receive up to a 100% scholarship based on their exam score.

FaqDATA.ques: Is their a difference in teaching quality between Pro and Pro-max program feature under Skillslash's Data Science courses?
FaqDATA.ans: No, absolutely not. Under both Pro and Pro-max features in our Data Science course in Canada, the classes are taken by Data Science experts in 100% live-interactive classes. Also, you can achieve a personalized learning experience with individual attention under our Data Science courses, irrespective of it being Pro or Pro-Max. In addition, for both program features, you can avail domain training and elective tracks for functional/industry specialization.
